text: 1 Teaching assignment - Minimum requirements for the Teaching programme. For the teaching assignments grants, teachers will be required to provide a short "Teaching programme" endorsed by both the sending and the host institution. Information about the host institution, department/faculty, programme concerned: • Name of the host Institution/department: • Name of the teaching staff: • Name of the contact person from the host institution: • Subject area: • Level ( Bachelor Year, , Master ): • Number of students at the host institution benefiting from the teaching programme: • Number of teaching hours: (Please note that it should be min. 8 hrs in total) • Number of teaching days: Objectives of the mobility: Added value of the mobility (both for the host institution and for the teacher): Expected results. (not limited to the number of students concerned): Name of the Teaching Staff: Date, Signature: Name of the Signatory from Host Institution: Signature : _____________________________ Stamp of the host Institution: Encl: Schedule, content of the teaching activity (Planned) 2 Time Monday Date: Tuesday Date: Wednesday Date: Thursday Date: Friday Date: SCHEDULE, CONTENT OF THE TEACHING ACTIVITY (Planned) 3
